title: 145: Skipping bowls, character flags, late round QB finds
itunes:title: 145: Skipping bowls, character flags, late round QB finds
description:
Daniel Jeremiah and Bucky Brooks discuss Stanford running back Christian McCaffrey and LSU running back Leonard Fournette decision to skip their teams bowl games and how it will impact their draft stock. The duo also talk about Joe Mixon and how teams evaluate character issues and red flags. DJ and Bucky break down the Texans decision to start Tom Savage at quarterback and teams who annually take a flyer on a late round QB.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
